search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4401: OK! I’m gonna make myself useful!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4402:
When you find a Voltorb, call out to it
gently and...
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4403: Come on! Let’s roll on home!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4404: Oh, that’s where you were hiding! Come with me!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4405: Sixtorb the Voltorb has a rare color!
It stands out, so it should be easy to spot...
Rare color... Could that color be...blue?
Yup! I knew you’d get it!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4406: Oh, unbelieva-ball! It’s actually a Spheal!
I’ve been looking all over for you, Spheal!

I guess it had gotten mixed up with my Spheal.
Before I knew it, it was following me around!
It’s not my Pokémon, but I’ve been looking for it!

Great! I’m glad we both found the Pokémon we
were looking for!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4407:
Seventorb the Voltorb is super strong but also
really friendly and kind...
It might be playing with children somewhere.
I see, I see... That’s understanda-ball!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4408:
Um... Were you eyeing that item ball? I want
it, too!
Actually, that’s a Pokémon! It’s probably a Voltorb!

But...this small tree is in the way, so I can’t
go over and round it up!
Then it’s time to use my secret technique!
I’m glad my secret practice with that paid off!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4409:
Hello there, young lady! Have you seen any
Voltorb around here?
What’s a Voltorb? I really don’t know.
Do you know what an Electrode is?
Yeah! My friends told me about it!
It’s over there playing with everyone!

So it evolved! Pokémon sure are
mysterious creatures!
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4410: Amoonguss... We’re not finding any of them...

Maybe we should head back and report what
we’ve found so far...
search_general_talk_ballguy_Pokemon/4411: We rounded up the whole gang! Outstanding!
